CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK(Case_Closed_Date__c), (TEXT(FLOOR((TODAY() - DATEVALUE(File_Date_Time__c))/365.2425)) & " year(s)"&", " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((TODAY() - DATEVALUE(File_Date_Time__c)),365.2425)/30)) & " month(s)"&", "& TEXT(Floor(MOD(Floor(MOD((TODAY() - DATEVALUE(File_Date_Time__c)),365.2425)),30))) & " day(s)"&"; "& "total of "&TEXT(TODAY() - DATEVALUE(File_Date_Time__c))&" day(s)"),
TEXT(FLOOR((Case_Closed_Date__c - DATEVALUE(File_Date_Time__c))/365.2425)) & " year(s)"&", " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((Case_Closed_Date__c - DATEVALUE(File_Date_Time__c)),365.2425)/30)) & " month(s)"&", "& TEXT(Floor(MOD(Floor(MOD((Case_Closed_Date__c - DATEVALUE(File_Date_Time__c)),365.2425)),30))) & " day(s)"&"; "&"total of "&TEXT(Case_Closed_Date__c - DATEVALUE(File_Date_Time__c))&" day(s)" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Case Closed Date minus File Date. If Case is not closed it is current age.
CustomField.label: Case Age
